--- title: "BUPA Great Yorkshire Run" date: "2012-09-02" author: "Adrian Joseph" image: https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport/2012-09-02_BUPA_GREAT_YORKSHIRE_RUN/img/00.png categories: [race report, run] format: html lightbox: match: auto effect: fade desc-position: right loop: false --- ![](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport/2012-09-02_BUPA_GREAT_YORKSHIRE_RUN/img/00.png) Another edition of my home race in Sheffield, UK. Always the same race going from the Crucible towards the Morrisons in Hillsborough Park area, and back. As always, a lot of runners, and a lot of cheering people and bands. Great atmosphere. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
